value.title: Microsoft, Lenovo, Big Tech Companies Sign UNESCO AI Ethics Recommendation
value.excerpt: The tech giants will be required to safeguard human rights in all stages of AI development, design, acquisition, sale, and usage under the terms of a new agreement signed by the tech corporations GSMA, INNIT, Lenovo Group, LG AI Research, Mastercard, Microsoft, Salesforce, and Telefonica.
